title: HTTP Adapter: org.eclipse.hono.client.ServerErrorException: no connection to service
body:
Version: 0.7-M2

For me HTTP Adapter gets stuck. It will not processes messages. I run two instances. Both are affected. After restart of the instances everything works fine. I didn't see any errors in logs of hono-messaging.

`06:40:50.723 [vert.x-eventloop-thread-1] DEBUG o.e.hono.client.impl.HonoClientImpl - reusing existing client [target: credentials/TENANT]
06:40:50.723 [vert.x-eventloop-thread-1] DEBUG o.e.h.c.i.AbstractRequestResponseClient - sent request [target address: credentials/TENANT, subject: get, correlation ID: cred-client-50612d2d-5581-47f6-a4c5-efa23fcad0a1] to service
06:40:50.726 [vert.x-eventloop-thread-1] DEBUG o.e.h.c.i.AbstractRequestResponseClient - received response [reply-to: credentials/TENANT/e8b576da-26f1-491f-8dd8-d1d0c2968fb9, subject: null, correlation ID: cred-client-50612d2d-5581-47f6-a4c5-efa23fcad0a1, status: 200]
06:40:50.726 [vert.x-eventloop-thread-1] DEBUG o.e.hono.client.impl.HonoClientImpl - already trying to create a message sender for telemetry/TENANT
06:40:50.726 [vert.x-eventloop-thread-1] DEBUG o.e.hono.client.impl.HonoClientImpl - reusing existing client [target: registration/TENANT]
06:40:50.726 [vert.x-eventloop-thread-1] DEBUG o.e.hono.client.impl.HonoClientImpl - reusing existing client [target: tenant]
06:40:50.726 [vert.x-eventloop-thread-1] DEBUG o.e.h.a.h.AbstractVertxBasedHttpProtocolAdapter - cannot process [telemetry] message from device [tenantId: TENANT, deviceId: DEVICE]
org.eclipse.hono.client.ServerErrorException: no connection to service
